snippet: The cartoon characters populating Times Square have formed a group, seeking respect from police officers who seem, to them, to be against them.
abstract: Cartoon characters populating Times Square have formed group called New York Artists United for a Smile, which seeks to improve its members' faltering public image; New York City laws forbid street performers to demand tips or panhandle aggressively, but at same time they are permitted to accept donations; police officers have been notifying pedestrians that tipping is not required, upsetting many street performers.
lead_paragraph: The cartoon characters populating Times Square have formed a group, seeking respect from police officers who seem, to them, to be against them.

headline.seo: Seeking Respect From Police, Times Square Mascots Form Alliance
headline.main: What Elmo and Spidey Want You to Know: They Have Rights
headline.print_headline: What Elmo and Spidey Want You to Know: They Have Rights

keywords.value: New York Artists United for a Smile
keywords.name: organizations
